Name: Hope
About the game: Alone you wake up amnesiac, trying to uncover your past by exploring the world. Hope is a point-and-click adventure game where you will seek out many items to combine and use them to solve puzzles. Most of the puzzles in the game are difficult, some of them are very hard. There is a hint section in the menu if you go under Settings.
